version_description:
NEW!
- New Operation: Forlorn Hope
- New Cycle of Evil event: Imitation Game
- New Gearheart Base layouts
IMPROVEMENTS
- HQ Upgrade requirements added to levels 6-8
- Retreating Critters no longer explode
- Defensive building ranges now shown during replays
- Base Layout improvements
- Friendly Challenge improvements

Boom Beach has partnered with Apple and (RED) in the fight for an Aids-free generation. From now until December 6th, 100% of the proceeds from your purchase of (PILE OF DIAMONDS)RED goes to fight AIDS with (RED).

Removed Games for (RED) content.

Thanks for all your support, Commander!
Extra Builders have arrived in Boom Beach! Update your game to hire Extra Builders from the shop and construct two buildings at once!

NEW
- New Hero - Dr. Kavan the jolly tribal medic with abilities including Crystal Critters, Ice Shield, and Second Wind!
- Blackguard Base Builder - Hammerman’s newest creation allows you to create Blackguard Bases and test them out in real time!
- Tribes - Available for HQ20+, you can now support the Tribal sectors and gain new bonuses via the map!
- Endless Reserves - Monthly subscription granting unlimited instant troop training! (gold cost still applies)

BALANCING
- Machine Guns now have a small blind zone
- Sgt. Brick - Attack damage increased, and Iron Will damage reduction now scales with level
- Cpt. Everspark - Attack damage increased, Demo Charge damage increased and has an area of effect

CHANGES
- Messages may now be hidden in Task Force chat by Officers
- Distress beacons added for locked Heroes

BUG FIXES
- Trader Notifications
- Trader Reward screen occasionally getting stuck after receiving 5 rewards
- Hero Perks now scale with level

FIXES:
- Visual fixes for Intel, resource, and VP rewards in Militia Strikes
- Out of Sync fixes when scouting bases
- High resolution textures enabled for more devices

NEW
- Private Bullit - The newest Boom Beach Hero! He’s rough around the edges but never afraid to get up close and personal.
- Added over 100 Basebuilder Bases into the Archipelago!

FIXES
- We had a chat with Sgt. Brick about insubordination and she will now follow Flares

NEW
- Private Bullit - The newest Boom Beach Hero! He’s rough around the edges but never afraid to get up close and personal.
- Added over 100 Basebuilder Bases into the Archipelago!

FIXES
- We had a chat with Sgt. Brick about insubordination and she will now follow Flares
- Fixed attack ranges
- Smooshed a bunch of bugs!
- Attack Radius Bug caused various issues for defenses and Troops
- Visual glitch causing Diamonds to appear to not accumulate from defenses

NEW
- Happy Beachmas! Player bases are now coated in snow, and a Beachmas Tree is available for all Commanders who log in throughout the holiday period.
- Prototroops! New experimental tank blueprints are now available from the Trader. Marvel at the mighty Lazortron, launch battle buddies with the Critter Cannon, and make it rain mortar shells with the Rain Maker!
- New Temporary Gun Boat Ability - The Cryo Bomb!
- Added more Blackguard Basebuilder Bases into the Archipelago.
- Villagers now deliver resources in one boat, rather than four.
- New Decorations tab allows you to store decorations for your base.
- Added language support for Finnish!

FIXES
- Fixed an error that caused disconnects during Task Force Operations
- Various other bug fixes and improvements
- Optimisation for iPhone X

The new update is here!

THE MEGA CRAB RETURNS
Dr. T’s infamous crustacean creation is back as a new monthly challenge for players to combat. Earn exclusive monthly rewards and climb the leaderboards as you battle against the mighty Mega Crab!

NEW PROTOTYPE DEFENSES
Five new Prototype Defenses will be available for creation at the Weapon Lab!

NEW TRIBE BONUSES
Thirteen new bonuses have been added to the Tribal Regions!

Various bug fixes, balance changes, and more!

NEW
- Happy Beachmas! Player bases are now coated in snow, and a Beachmas Tree is available for all Commanders who log in throughout the holiday period.
- Prototroops! New experimental tank blueprints are now available from the Trader. Marvel at the mighty Lazortron, launch battle buddies with the Critter Cannon, and make it rain mortar shells with the Rain Maker!
- New Temporary Gun Boat Ability - The Cryo Bomb!
- Added more Blackguard Basebuilder Bases into the Archipelago.
- Villagers now deliver resources in one boat, rather than four.
- New Decorations tab allows you to store decorations for your base.
- Added language support for Finnish!

FIXES
- Fixed an error that caused disconnects during Task Force Operations
- Various other bug fixes and improvements
- Optimisation for iPhone X

NEW
- Prototroops! New experimental tank blueprints are now available from the Trader. Marvel at the mighty Lazortron, launch battle buddies with the Critter Cannon, and make it rain mortar shells with the Rain Maker!
- New Temporary Gun Boat Ability - The Cryo Bomb!
- Added more Blackguard Basebuilder Bases into the Archipelago.
- Villagers now deliver resources in one boat, rather than four.
- New Decorations tab allows you to store decorations for your base.
- Added language support for Finnish!

FIXES
- Fixed an error that caused disconnects during Task Force Operations
- Various other bug fixes and improvements
- Optimisation for iPhone X

NEW UPDATE!
- New Operation: Duplexity! New Dual Core gameplay makes this the most challenging Task Force Operation to date.
- New Hero levels: Dr. Kavan & Sgt. Brick have new upgrade levels!
- Various Fixes & Improvements

NEW UPDATE!
- New Operation: Duplexity! New Dual Core gameplay makes this the most challenging Task Force Operation to date.
- New Hero levels: Dr. Kavan & Sgt. Brick have new upgrade levels!
- Various Fixes & Improvements

Various minor bug fixes and improvements

What is arriving in Boom Beach in this update:

・Warships Season 4
・New Warship Troop - Seeker
・Warship Leaderboard Trophy
・Admiral’s Key which unlocks all headquarters level requirements in your warship tech tree for that season
・Shard Conversion
・Over 1000 New Imitation Game Bases
・Video tab to showcase the Boom Tubers!

Extra:
・Larger health bar for heroes
・Task Force Tag is easier to share
・Various other small bug fixes and improvements

What is arriving in Boom Beach in this update:

• Warships Season 3
• New Warship Troop - The Bombardier
• New Warship Trophies!
• Season End Rewards
• See your opponents battle status
• Troop Timers in Warships reduced by 50%

Extra:
• Supercell ID Update
• Various bug fixes and improvements

WARSHIPS! Our biggest UPDATE ever!

• Real-time PvP Combat comes to Boom Beach!
• Take on the world and top the Warships Leaderboard
• Build up your Warship with the Tech Tree
• Climb up the Ranks and win epic rewards

Extra:
• Change your name with Diamonds
• New Mega Crab Legendary Trophies to obtain
• Various bug fixes and improvements

New and improved Proto Troops are landing in Boom Beach!

This update includes:
- Proto Troops, including the Engineer and CryoBombardier and more!
- Improved Trader system with new offers
- Cycle of Evil events running longer than before! Back to back!
- Events now starting at the same time globally, including Mega Crab and Cycle of Evil
- Content Creator Boost added to the Shop
- Fixed the bug of Trader leaving early
- Other bug fixes and improvements

Lots of improvements in this Boom Beach update!

This update includes:
– Fixes to battles and win rates in Warships
– More Proto Troops, like Incinerator and CryoTank
– Added confirmation button to Trader purchases
– Balance changes, including Engineer and Shock Launcher
– Fixed Creator Code issue to allow repeat codes back to back every week
– Other bug fixes and improvements

HQ24 is here! Check out the new troop Mech!

This update includes:
– HQ24
– New main island troop Mech
– Classified Items
– Scorcher now only 14 housing space with lower GBE cost
– Balance and progression changes
– Other bug fixes and improvements
